amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to authorize counties to be included in Good Neighbor Authority cooperative agreements and contracts in order to improve forest health and bolster watershed restoration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to authorize counties to be included in Good Neighbor Authority cooperative agreements and contracts in order to improve forest health and bolster watershed restoration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
